text: Musculus is a genus of mussels in the family Mytilidae.Abbott, R.T. & Morris, P.A. A Field Guide to Shells: Atlantic and Gulf Coasts and the West Indies. New York: Houghton Mifflin, 1995. 18-19. ==Selected species== * Musculus discors (Linnaeus, 1767) -- discord mussel * Musculus lateralis (Say, 1822) -- lateral mussel * Musculus niger (Gray, 1824) -- little black mussel * †Musculus somaliensis Cox, 1935 ==References== Category:Bivalve genera
title: Musculus (bivalve)
